00010 #include "ndarray_fwd.hpp"
00011 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_facade.hpp>

00013 namespace ndarray {
00014 namespace detail {
00015 
00021 template <typename T>
00022 class StridedIterator : public boost::iterator_facade<
00023     StridedIterator<T>, 
00024     T, boost::random_access_traversal_tag
00025     >
00026 {
00027 public:
00028     typedef T Value;
00029     typedef T & Reference;
00030     
00031     StridedIterator() : _data(0), _stride(0) {}
00032 
00033     StridedIterator(T * data, int stride) : _data(data), _stride(stride) {}
00034 
00035     StridedIterator(StridedIterator const & other) : _data(other._data), _stride(other._stride) {}
00036 
00037     template <typename U>
00038     StridedIterator(StridedIterator<U> const & other) : _data(other._data), _stride(other._stride) {
00039         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((boost::is_convertible<U*,T*>::value));
00040     }
00041 
00042     StridedIterator & operator=(StridedIterator const & other) {
00043         if (&other != this) {
00044             _data = other._data;
00045             _stride = other._stride;
00046         }
00047         return *this;
00048     }
00049 
00050     template <typename U>
00051     StridedIterator & operator=(StridedIterator<U> const & other) {
00052         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((boost::is_convertible<U*,T*>::value));
00053         _data = other._data;
00054         _stride = other._stride;
00055         return *this;
00056     }
00057 
00058 private:
00059 
00060     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00061 
00062     template <typename OtherT> friend class StridedIterator;
00063 
00064     Reference dereference() const { return *_data; }
00065 
00066     void increment() { _data += _stride; }
00067     void decrement() { _data -= _stride; }
00068     void advance(int n) { _data += _stride * n; }
00069 
00070     template <typename U>
00071     int distance_to(StridedIterator<U> const & other) const {
00072         return std::distance(_data, other._data) / _stride; 
00073     }
00074 
00075     template <typename U>
00076     bool equal(StridedIterator<U> const & other) const {
00077         return _data == other._data;
00078     }
00079 
00080     T * _data;
00081     int _stride;
00082 
00083 };
00084 
00085 } // namespace detail
00086 } // namespace ndarray
